name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Site Reliability Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in developing and managing high-performance solutions, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in critical technologies such as **GCP**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, **Python**, and **Node.js**, with a strong foundation in **GoLang**, **C++**, and **Java**. I have a proven track record in implementing robust CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure using **Terraform**, ensuring seamless deployment processes.
Demonstrating expertise in observability and monitoring with tools such as **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **Kibana**, I excel at creating scalable systems aligned with compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My hands-on experience includes managing microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and employing **Redis** for in-memory data structures.
Furthermore, I leverage advanced logging and tracing mechanisms using **Elasticsearch**, **FluentD**, and **OpenTelemetry** to enhance system reliability and performance. I am committed to maximizing uptime and performance through innovative strategies, strong collaboration using tools like **Jira**, **Confluence**, and **Bitbucket**, and a solid grasp of networking principles (HTTP(s), DNS, TCP/IP).
